title: G510 How do I save battery power?
answer:
To save battery power, touch Power saving mode in Settings, or perform the following  

operations as required:  

When you are not using the phone, press the Power key to turn off the screen.  

Touch Settings > All > Display > Sleep to set the timeout period to a small value.  

Touch Settings > All > Display > Brightness to set the brightness to a small value.  

Touch Settings > All and turn off Wi-Fi and Bluetooth. You can also turn off Wi-Fi and  

Bluetooth from the notification panel.  

Drag the status bar down to display the notification panel. Turn off data synchronization.  

Touch Settings > All > Mobile networks and clear Data enabled to disable the data  

service. You can also turn off the data service from the notification panel.  

Touch Settings > All > Location services and clear GPS satellites to disable the GPS  

function. You can also turn off the GPS function from the notification panel.
